name: SpyDer (itch)
description:
Infiltrate the evil Wasp HQ as the top secret agent Spyder. Use your webs to swing around, but avoid the laser beams in the 70s throwback. Use your webs to swing around on levels in your own way. Avoid the deadly laser beams and cameras to stay stealthy in this tricky platformer. Do you have what it takes to be a secret agent?

Music

This music is a stand in currently, and we have no intentions to steal or keep it. Credit to the band who produced it here:

  • Budos Rising - The Budos Band
  • King Cobra - The Budos Band
  • Ride or Die - The Budos Band

Steps to Help

1.) Download

> Please download the game and play through to the end, or until you feel like you are done. 

2.) Feedback

> Once you finish playing, please fill out this google form. This allows us to work with your feedback and make our game better

Testing Form

This is the most important part of this whole process. Please fill this out after you are done playing.

https://forms.gle/DF1EtdLunkUxwh1T7
